So with that being said 16 months almost 17months of inverted nipple and pain and the masses are getting bigger. Just not understanding why they are taking their time... I just wish they would hurry up.. And i wish they would act like they care. But my luck. Lol. So hopefully they call me sooner and hopefully we can figure this out..
